answers.text: NACLs are stateful. Default NACL blocks all inbound traffic by default.
NACLs are stateless. Default NACL blocks all inbound traffic by default.
NACLs are stateless. Default NACL allows all inbound traffic by default.
NACLs are stateful. Default NACL allows all inbound traffic by default.

text: Which of the following is a correct statement about your VPC's default Network Access Control List (NACL) and inbound traffic?
